profileAlternative.name: Rohan Kumar
profileAlternative.headline: Corporate Vice President, Azure Data at Microsoft
profileAlternative.summary: As the Corporate Vice President of Azure Data, Rohan is the engineering leader responsible for the product strategy, technical vision, long range plan and strategy, design, development/implementation, engineering process involving the certification and release of SQL Server, and all Azure Data Services including SQL Database, Cosmos DB, Database for MySQL, Database for PostgreSQL, Database for Maria DB, SQL Data Warehouse, Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake, HDInsight, Azure Stream Analytics, Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Catalog and Microsoft’s Analytics Platform System (APS). As part of his charter, Rohan is focused on delivering core data platform services for Microsoft that allow IT professionals, DBAs, Data Scientists, Data Engineers and Developers to successfully develop, deploy, and manage data applications across Azure Data Services and SQL Server workloads.

As part of his charter, Rohan is focused on delivering core data platform services for Microsoft that allow IT professionals, DBAs, Data Scientists, Data Engineers and Developers to successfully develop, deploy, and manage data applications across Azure Data Services and SQL Server workloads.

positions.title:
Title
General Manager, Database Systems
positions.description:
As the GENERAL MANAGER of Database Systems, Rohan is the product and engineering leader responsible for the product strategy, technical vision, long range plan and strategy, design, development/implementation, engineering process involving the certification and release of Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Datawarehouse, SQL Server, SQL Server in IaaS VMs and Microsoft’s Analytics Platform System (APS). As part of his charter, Rohan is focused on delivering core data platform services for Microsoft that allow IT professionals, DBAs, and Developers to successfully develop, deploy, and manage OLTP/DW data applications across Azure and SQL Server workloads.

educations.title: Indian Institute of Technology (Banaras Hindu University), Varanasi

given.text: Ketan is a strong technical lead and an empathetic people manager. He cares for his people and is passionate about career development of ICs. He speaks his mind even when his opinion may not be popular - a quality which I really appreciated. He has made valuable contributions to SQL Server during his tenure as an IC and a dev lead.

items: Managing a binary object in a database system
Remote storage and management of binary object data
User mode file system serialization and reliability
Multi-protocol access to files and directories
Protocol-independent client-side caching system and method

On a mission to enable every org to transform to a digital biz. Led Enterprise/Customer Success/Services @ MSFT/SAP/HP.
Former President of the United States of America
